uk.ac.ebi.mdk.service.location
Interface ResourceLocation

All Known Subinterfaces:
ResourceDirectoryLocation, ResourceFileLocation
All Known Implementing Classes:
GZIPRemoteLocation, GZIPSystemLocation, RemoteLocation, SystemDirectoryLocation, SystemLocation, ZIPRemoteLocation, ZIPSystemLocation
public interface ResourceLocation

ResourceLocation - 21.02.2012

Describes a location of a resource that can be loaded. This interface serves a base for other resource locations to build upon and it's primary function is determine whether the resource is available to be loaded.

Version:
$Rev$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)

Method Summary
 boolean isAvailable()
          Method determines if the location defined by the resource is available for the loader to use.
 

Method Detail

isAvailable

boolean isAvailable()
Method determines if the location defined by the resource is available for the loader to use. On a local system file this could be whether the file exists, whilst on a remote location (e.g. FTP) it could check the connection.

Returns:
whether the resource location is available
